channel.title: Home on Buhooro Wellness, Retreat Wakiso, nr Entebbe, Uganda
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Buhooro Wellness, Retreat Wakiso, nr Entebbe, Uganda

item.title: Stay
item.description: Your stay at Buhooro There are five staff permanently on site, with a guard taking care of security, and our excellent house keeper running the house and supervising guests. All our staff are friendly and welcoming. The main part of the bungalow is open plan with kitchen-dining area and lounge combined, and the French windows look out over Lake Victoria. You can sit and take tea with the afternoon on-shore breeze cooling, either in the lounge or on the verandah.

item.title: Gallery
item.description: The relaxing beauty of Buhooro Above: Fishermen head out on to the Lake. Above: the beach with its naturally-occuring sand with a small rocky island just off the shore. Above and below: The Verandah with spectacular views of Lake Victoria. Great for afternoon tea or taking lunch. Above: The kitchen patio catches the evening sun. Above and below: Many species of East Africans birds are frequent visitors including the iconic Crested Crane, a spectacular bird which is on the Ugandan flag.

item.title: Events
item.description: The retreat is popular for many types of events, such as birthday and wedding parties, or any type of celebration. And it’s perfect for photography, such as portraiture of weddings.

item.title: Videography
item.description: Our beautiful location is great for videography. Below: video by Ugandan star Azawi. Shows exterior and interiors of the house and the tree swing over-looking the Lake. Get in touch with us if you are interested in our location for your project.

item.title: Enquiry
item.description: Title: Name (first name, last name): Your email address: Note: we will never share your email with anyone else. Give details of your enquiry; booking a stay, or event, or videography? Submit

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy We don’t put cookies in our pages to track visitors.

item.title: Success
item.description: Your enquiry was sent successfully. Thank you.

item.title: Visit
item.description: Make Buhooro your base camp to explore Uganda Both Entebbe and Kampala are a short drive from Buhooro. The Express Highway can take you all the way to Munyonyo and Ggaba in South Kampala. Kampala has a buzzing nightlife and many bars and restaurants. Entebbe has beautiful lakeside beach resorts and historic buildings as well as the Botanical Gardens which also hosts a very varied wildlife. From Kampala, you can travel out of the capital to Jinja, and to Soroti in the north, as well as Mbarara and Kisoro in the westerly direction.
